data.text: Hey, Kris S! Have you tried the dango? I've already had five! They're so darn chewy, I just can't stooop!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: Hey, Kris S! Have you tried the dango? I've already had five! They're so darn chewy, I just can't stooop!

data.text:
You eatin' your fill, Rob Roy? 
You need to eat a whole lot and recharge~!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>You eatin' your fill, Rob Roy? 
<story>You need to eat a whole lot and recharge~!

data.text:
Y-yes! I've had some of the dango. 
It's cute how they look like little bunnies.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Y-yes! I've had some of the dango. 
<story>It's cute how they look like little bunnies.

data.text: Very good! You made a nice hustle training and filled your belly... So we got you one last thing, for a job well done!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: Very good! You made a nice hustle training and filled your belly... So we got you one last thing, for a job well done!

data.text:
It's a present from both of us! 
A hammer for your shoes!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>It's a present from both of us! 
<story>A hammer for your shoes!!

data.text:
And―― another gift. 
――Records of our recent training.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
<story>And―― another gift. 
<story>――Records of our recent training.

data.text: You worked super, DUPER hard, and made a big jump in such a short time!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: You worked super, DUPER hard, and made a big jump in such a short time!

data.text:
You're fit as a fiddle for the fall season! 
I just know you're gonna win it all!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>You're fit as a fiddle for the fall season! 
<story>I just know you're gonna win it all!

data.text:
――Take this to heart ―― and move forward. 
You can―― do it.
data.name: Symboli Kris S
data.processed:
<story>――Take this to heart ―― and move forward. 
<story>You can―― do it.

data.text:
...Of course!! 
Thank you. I won't let you down...!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>...Of course!! 
<story>Thank you. I won't let you down...!

data.text:
Last mission... 
Neo Universe will "transfer"...
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Last mission... 
<story>Neo Universe will "transfer"...

data.text: Having a good time, Universe?
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed: <story>Having a good time, Universe?

data.text:
You've done a lot leading up to now. 
So let me give you a reward.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>You've done a lot leading up to now. 
<story>So let me give you a reward.

data.text:
One... 
Two... 
Three.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>One... 
<story>Two... 
<story>Three.

data.text: ...A 『shoe care tool』?
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>...A 『shoe care tool』?

data.text:
You've gotten to learn a lot about it firsthand. 
The joy of "telling" someone your feelings.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>You've gotten to learn a lot about it firsthand. 
<story>The joy of "telling" someone your feelings.

data.text: ――Always remember that joy.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed: <story>――Always remember that joy.

data.text:
You're a girl who can "tell" and "connect". 
This is proof. 
...Take good care of it.
data.name: Fuji Kiseki
data.processed:
<story>You're a girl who can "tell" and "connect". 
<story>This is proof. 
<story>...Take good care of it.

data.text:
...Affirmative. Fuji Kiseki repaired the "terminated" connection. 
Our "space sign". So...――
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>...Affirmative. Fuji Kiseki repaired the "terminated" connection. 
<story>Our "space sign". So...――

data.text:
"Mutev."... 
『Thank you』, Fuji Kiseki.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>"Mutev."... 
<story>『Thank you』, Fuji Kiseki.

data.text:
――"Downlink", "downlink". 
"GRSS"... The [*sky*] will 『connect』 too――
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>――"Downlink", "downlink". 
<story>"GRSS"... The [*sky*] will 『connect』 too――

data.text: ――Uni-san!
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>――Uni-san!

data.text:
So this is where you were! 
...What are you doing?
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>So this is where you were! 
<story>...What are you doing?

data.text:
『Watching』 the [*sky*]. 
The same [*world*] as Zenno Rob Roy. And――
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>『Watching』 the [*sky*]. 
<story>The same [*world*] as Zenno Rob Roy. And――

data.text:
Last mission. 
Neo Universe wanted to『give』this 『shoe care tool』.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Last mission. 
<story>Neo Universe wanted to『give』this 『shoe care tool』.

data.text:
Ah... For me...? 
――Thank you so much. I'll use it with care.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Ah... For me...? 
<story>――Thank you so much. I'll use it with care.

data.text: Zenno Rob Roy. Look.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: <story>Zenno Rob Roy. Look.

data.text:
The sky... The moon is beautiful tonight. 
It's as if it's completely full.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>The sky... The moon is beautiful tonight. 
<story>It's as if it's completely full.

data.text:
Mmhm. This "observation" of the [*sky*]... is "shared". 
Because Zenno Rob Roy "tried".
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Mmhm. This "observation" of the [*sky*]... is "shared". 
<story>Because Zenno Rob Roy "tried".

data.text: Ah...
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: <story>Ah...

data.text:
(――The world I've never known. The world as Uni-san sees it. 
The world I've always wanted to see. 
Am I, however slightly... sharing it with her?)
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>(――The world I've never known. The world as Uni-san sees it. 
<story>The world I've always wanted to see. 
<story>Am I, however slightly... sharing it with her?)

data.text:
Uni-san... 
I've always wanted to see this sky.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed:
<story>Uni-san... 
<story>I've always wanted to see this sky.

data.text: Sphira. We overcame a "distance" of "4.2 light years", and『connected』.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed: Sphira. We overcame a "distance" of "4.2 light years", and『connected』.

data.text: ――Yes. I'm sphira too.
data.name: Zenno Rob Roy
data.processed: ――Yes. I'm sphira too.

data.text:
Boop boop. 
Boop beep boop boop. 
Beep boop beep beep.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>Boop boop. 
<story>Boop beep boop boop. 
<story>Beep boop beep beep.

data.text:
『I』『L』『Y』 
――"Transmission" complete.
data.name: Neo Universe
data.processed:
<story>『I』『L』『Y』 
<story>――"Transmission" complete.
